snippet: The United States and Canada signed an accord in Washington on Friday to protect the Great Lakes, the world’s largest freshwater system.
abstract: United States and Canada sign an accord to protect the Great Lakes, the world's largest freshwater system, from major threats including water pollution and invasive species.
lead_paragraph: The United States and Canada signed an accord in Washington on Friday to protect the Great Lakes, the world’s largest freshwater system.

headline.main: Pact Is Signed to Protect Great Lakes
headline.print_headline: Pact Is Signed To Protect Great Lakes
